thread.title: Ugandan shilling in firm position on commodity flows

author: Reuters Editorial
title: Ugandan shilling in firm position on commodity flows

organizations.name: calculated cross rates deposits deposits & forwards uganda equities

text:
KAMPALA, April 6 (Reuters) - The Ugandan shilling was unchanged on Friday amid some inflows of hard currency from exporters of coffee and other commodities weighing against sagging importer demand.
At 0822 GMT commercial banks Quote: d the shilling at 3,690/3,700 the same level as Thursdayâ€™s close.
